alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lipscomb, Wheeler, northeastern Carson, northern Gray, southern Roberts and Hemphill Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 907 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Miami, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Canadian, Miami, Briscoe, Wheeler, Lefors, Higgins, New Mobeetie, Twitty, Allison, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Kellerville, Lora, Kingsmill, Codman and Mobeetie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Roberts; Wheeler
